Tooltip¶

Tooltip is a core plugin, therefore any other plugin can override the way the tooltip react to events and renders as html.

tooltip
template(d)¶
Arguments:
  • d – data element which should be included in the tooltip
Returns:

html string which render the data element in the tooltip
fill¶

The color to fill the tooltip background
